Class AgentManager

java.lang.Object
  com.riskIt.controller.AgentManager

public class AgentManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class has methods that is related to the agent queries and help methods that helps create a new user, calculate the score and other helper methods

calculatePurePremium

public double calculatePurePremium(Invitation inv)
This method calculates the pure premium value using the total property value and the exposure unit that insurance covers for one full year

Parameters:
inv - - it is a object holding all data of customer needed to calculate the premium
Returns:
premium - the pure premium value calculated for the given criteria

calculateExpenseForExpo

public double calculateExpenseForExpo(Invitation inv)
THis method calculates the expense for every exposure unit. This value is given by the company for the amount of possible loss coverage

Parameters:
inv - - object holding the information of customer
Returns:
expo - expense for every unit of exposure of property

Returns:
tempPremium - the actual premium value given to customer

compareCustomerZones

public double compareCustomerZones(Invitation inv,
                                   double premium)
This method accepts the customer object and premium value calculated till half point and then compares the customer's zipcode to see where he stays, his age and his score and then calculates the final premium

Parameters:
inv - - customer object
premium - - the temporary premium value
Returns:
premium value for each month

calculateTotalValue

public double calculateTotalValue(Invitation inv)
This method puts all methods to calculate the premium together as one call

Parameters:
inv - - customer data object
Returns:
- the monthly premium
